subject: Charged twice for subscription
body: I was charged $49.99 twice this month for my Pro subscription. Please refund the duplicate charge. Order ID: ORD-78234

subject: App crashes on login
body: The mobile app crashes every time I try to log in. I've tried reinstalling but the issue persists. iPhone 14 Pro iOS 17.2

subject: Feature request - dark mode
body: Would love to see a dark mode option in the desktop app. My eyes get tired during late night sessions.

subject: Cancel subscription
body: I need to cancel my subscription before the next billing cycle. Please confirm cancellation and any remaining balance.

subject: Data not syncing
body: My data hasn't synced across devices for 3 days. I have critical work documents that need to be accessible. This is urgent!
